All Classes|All Packages

U

uniqueDisplay(String, LinkedList<Integer>) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
allows to verify if the story must be displayed in just one time : if it has one conclusion and a unique path toward it This must not be called before verifying if the story can be displayed or not (it is considered that there is definitely a conclusion)
unlockChoice(int) - Method in class dao.ChoixDAO
this method allows to unlock the choice if the writer does not want no longer write the choice's paragraph, it also do some cleaning by deleting the paragraph written by the user before that.
unpublish_story(String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
to unpublish a story (reading mode) : change the corresponding boolean in the database
unpublishForWriting(String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
allows to indicate in the data base that the story is private for writing

Utilisateur() - Constructor for class beans.Utilisateur
 
UtilisateurDAO - Class in dao
 
UtilisateurDAO(DataSource) - Constructor for class dao.UtilisateurDAO
